lead_paragraph: DEAN--Edwin, passed on January 9, 2014 in Boulder, CO. Born December 27, 1936 in Nashville, TN. He is survived by his wife, Kathy Wood Dean and their three sons: Warner, Joel, and Riley. A celebration of his life will be held February 10, 2014 at 5pm at the Church of Heavenly Rest in New York City. In lieu of flowers, donations can be sent to the Edwin and Percy Warner Parks Foundation, 50 Vaughn Road, Nashville, TN. He will be missed by all who knew him. The Clairmont and Gibbons families
